org.sxb.config

クラス Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.config.Constants

  • public final class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    The constant for Sxb runtime. SXB运行时常量池 此类中的值在框架启动时初始化

    • メソッドの詳細

      • setTokenCache

        public void setTokenCache(ITokenCache tokenCache)
        Set ITokenCache implementation otherwise Sxb will use the HttpSesion to hold the token.
        パラメータ:
        tokenCache - the token cache

      • getTokenCache

        public ITokenCache getTokenCache()

      • setDevMode

        public void setDevMode(boolean devMode)
        Set development mode.
        パラメータ:
        devMode - the development mode

      • setEncoding

        public void setEncoding(java.lang.String encoding)
        Set encoding. The default encoding is UTF-8.
        パラメータ:
        encoding - the encoding

      • getEncoding

        public java.lang.String getEncoding()

      • getDevMode

        public boolean getDevMode()

      • getUrlParaSeparator

        public java.lang.String getUrlParaSeparator()

      • getViewType

        public ViewType getViewType()

      • setViewType

        public void setViewType(ViewType viewType)
        Set view type. The default value is ViewType.FREE_MARKER Controller.render(String view) will use the view type to render the view.
        パラメータ:
        viewType - the view type

      • setUrlParaSeparator

        public void setUrlParaSeparator(java.lang.String urlParaSeparator)
        Set urlPara separator. The default value is "-"
        パラメータ:
        urlParaSeparator - the urlPara separator

      • getJspViewExtension

        public java.lang.String getJspViewExtension()

      • setJspViewExtension

        public void setJspViewExtension(java.lang.String jspViewExtension)
        Set Jsp view extension. The default value is ".jsp"
        パラメータ:
        jspViewExtension - the Jsp view extension

      • getFreeMarkerViewExtension

        public java.lang.String getFreeMarkerViewExtension()

      • setFreeMarkerViewExtension

        public void setFreeMarkerViewExtension(java.lang.String freeMarkerViewExtension)
        Set FreeMarker view extension. The default value is ".html" not ".ftl"
        パラメータ:
        freeMarkerViewExtension - the FreeMarker view extension

      • getVelocityViewExtension

        public java.lang.String getVelocityViewExtension()

      • setVelocityViewExtension

        public void setVelocityViewExtension(java.lang.String velocityViewExtension)
        Set Velocity view extension. The default value is ".vm"
        パラメータ:
        velocityViewExtension - the Velocity view extension

      • getFileRenderPath

        public java.lang.String getFileRenderPath()

      • setFileRenderPath

        public void setFileRenderPath(java.lang.String fileRenderPath)
        Set the path of file render of controller.

        The path is start with root path of this web application. The default value is "/download" if you do not config this parameter.

      • setUploadedFileSaveDirectory

        public void setUploadedFileSaveDirectory(java.lang.String uploadedFileSaveDirectory)
        Set the save directory for upload file. You can use PathUtil.getWebRootPath() to get the web root path of this application, then create a path based on web root path conveniently.

      • getUploadedFileSaveDirectory

        public java.lang.String getUploadedFileSaveDirectory()

      • getMaxPostSize

        public int getMaxPostSize()

      • setMaxPostSize

        public void setMaxPostSize(int maxPostSize)
        Set max size of http post. The upload file size depend on this value.

      • setI18nDefaultBaseName

        public void setI18nDefaultBaseName(java.lang.String defaultBaseName)
        Set default base name to load Resource bundle. The default value is "i18n". Example: setI18nDefaultBaseName("i18n");

      • setI18nDefaultLocale

        public void setI18nDefaultLocale(java.lang.String defaultLocale)
        Set default locale to load Resource bundle. The locale string like this: "zh_CN" "en_US".
        Example: setI18nDefaultLocale("zh_CN");

      • setFreeMarkerTemplateUpdateDelay

        public void setFreeMarkerTemplateUpdateDelay(int delayInSeconds)
        FreeMarker template update delay for not devMode.

      • getFreeMarkerTemplateUpdateDelay

        public int getFreeMarkerTemplateUpdateDelay()

      • setBaseViewPath

        public void setBaseViewPath(java.lang.String baseViewPath)
        Set the base path for all views

      • setMainRenderFactory

        public void setMainRenderFactory(IMainRenderFactory mainRenderFactory)
        Set the mainRenderFactory then your can use your custom render in controller as render(String).
